comment._content:
Hugh Robinson Aero Club of America Pilot # 42   June 25, 1911
Lieut. George. E. M. Kelly  Never obtained license from Aero Club of America   killed May 10, 1911 Fort Sam Houston, Texas  Curtiss  Type IV Model D.
Lieut. John C. Walker , Jr.    Never obtained license from Aero Club of America.
